attributes.comment:
This is to request that the fees for adopting a foreign orphan NOT be increased.
Or, if the decision to raise fees is made, then please extend the life of the I-171,
from 18 months to 24. Also, the fingerprinting (that is required) for the I-171 should
be extended to match the length of the I-171. Currently, fingerprints are only good
for 12 months. With China's wait times extended to 16-18 months, many of us are
refiling ALL this paperwork. It is another cost and stressor in a process that has
become over-crowded with fees, additional fees, unexpected increases in fees,
and stress-upon-stress in what is and SHOULD be a wonderful, exciting, and
magical time of building a family.
Thank you!
Sincerely,
Bonnie Behling
in-process adoptive parent
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Bonnie Behling
